## CodeBlockExtensionOptions.syntaxTheme property

The theme to use for the codeBlocks.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
syntaxTheme?: SyntaxTheme | false;
```

## Remarks

Currently only one theme can be set per editor.

Set this to false if you want to manage the syntax styles by yourself. For tips on how this could be accomplished see [https://prismjs.com](https://prismjs.com)
